data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: There was a big argument at the town meeting tonight. Some ____ in ____ think ____ there ____ be ____ to ____ school ____. But ____ is ____ everyone's ____. The issue was not decided tonight, and will be brought up again at the meeting next month.
data.partBlankContent: There was a big argument at the town meeting tonight. Some peo___ in to__ think th__ there sho___ be cha____ to t__ school sys___. But th__ is n__ everyone's opi____. The issue was not decided tonight, and will be brought up again at the meeting next month.
data.answer: 在今晚的镇民大会上发生了一场激烈的争论。镇上有些人认为学校制度应该改变。但并不是所有人都这么认为。这个问题今晚没有决定，将在下个月的会议上再次提出。
